channel.title: Live Aid on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: How to Stream ‘Live Aid: When Rock ‘n’ Roll Took Over the World’ Online
item.description: CNN’s original four-part series takes music fans behind the scenes of the benefit concert that featured performances by Queen, EU2, Mick Jagger with Tina Turner and other icons.
